items.title: Stop lugging around your Switch 2 dock around, this mini charger connects you to the big screen in 4K for $40 [Launch deal]
items.summary:
There’s not very many travel-ready charger docks for Switch 2 out there, but this new JSAUX option is ready to connect you to the big screen anywhere. Yes, you can just lug around the sizable Switch 2 dock to make it happen anyway, but that’s not exactly the most compact or convenient way to make it happen – the new OmniCentro Charger Dock for Switch 2 is about the size of an average wall charger and you can score an early pre-order deal on it at $39.99 right now.

items.title: Start your compost journey with this 43-gallon two-chamber East Oak tumbler at $70
items.summary:
East Oak Outdoor Compost Tumbler

Buy for $70 (Reg. $85)

What we love

Many folks are learning and utilizing the benefits of composting more and more these days, and this handy 43-gallon tumbler brings more sensibility to the practice with its dual chambers – one for completing compost, and one for freshly thrown-in scraps. The 360-degree rotation eliminates the need to hand mix or dig through it all, with the overall BPA-free form factor being made from PP material and steel for eco-friendly durability.

items.title: Get up to 50 miles of pedal-assisted commuting support with Vanpower’s City Vanture e-bike at $799 (Save $950)
items.summary:
Vanpowers is bringing back an earlier fall promotion on its City Vanture Urban Commuter e-bike at $799 shipped, after using the code VANVIP at checkout. The price here starts with a cut from $1,749 to $1,099, which gets an additional $300 savings thanks to the code, which is a repeat combo discount that we last saw at the top of September. All-in-all, you’re getting a $950 markdown that drops things to the best price directly from the brand, which has only been beaten by a one-time exclusive Wellbots deal from January.

items.title: Just $13 gets you 8BitDo’s pocket-sized gamepad today that’s also an Apple Shortcuts controller, more (47% off)
items.summary:
8BitDo’s pocket-sized Micro gamepad

Buy for $13 (Reg. $25)

What we love

This ultra-compact, pocket-sized controller is among the smallest available, weighing just 24.8 grams. Despite its tiny frame, it houses a 180mAh battery that delivers up to 10 hours of playtime. It even supports a wired USB-C connection, so you can use it with the Switch, Android devices, Raspberry Pi, and more. What we particularly like about this model is its Keyboard Mode, which lets you use it across PC, Android, Mac, iOS, and iPad for handling shortcuts in productivity apps.
